sqlMap.insert: insert into nboard(title, pass, name, content, hits, rdate) values(#title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, 0, NOW())
sqlMap.select:
select b.* from ( select row_number() over (order by unq desc) as rn, a.* from (
select unq ,title, name, hits, DATE_FORMAT(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d')as rdate from nboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
order by unq desc ) as a ) as b
where rn >= #startIndex# and rn <= #endIndex#

select count(*) total from nboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
